research_interest: Research Interests: Software Engineering, Information Security, Distributed Computing
about_news: I am seeking job opportunities starting from April 2024 in academia and industry. I am also open to startup ideas and business collaboration. Please feel free to contact me if you have any interest.
about_academia: I am passionate about constructing provably correct systems by discovering theories from practice and developing methodologies for practice. My primary focus centers around the security and privacy aspects of software engineering, particularly decentralized systems spanning protocol and application levels. Currently, I am constructing transition-oriented programming, a new programming paradigm to facilitate developing provably correct systems.
about_industry: Meanwhile, I am a system architect certified by the Chinese, Japanese, and Korean governments. I have directed dozens of development projects for startups and institutes since 2015. Besides, I am actively exploring the best current practice of developing robust, secure, and efficient systems with minimum cost.
